scripts.setup:python: cd backend-python && python -m venv venv && venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n "FRONTEND,BACKEND,PYTHON" -c "cyan,magenta,yellow" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:python"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start:all: concurrently -n "FRONTEND,BACKEND,PYTHON" -c "cyan,magenta,yellow" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:python"
